Welcome

08 Aug 2019 - geru

If you didn’t realize, the site has moved from platanofootball.com to platanofb.com - it’s less typing. The rule have not changed and you can check those out by hitting the link in the menu. I’ll post more in this very post tomorrow morning, but for now I just wanted to get this site up and running. Get pumped for another season of NFL and Platano Football!
